titles.title: A resolution designating the week of October 16 through 22, 2022, as "National Chemistry Week".
A resolution designating the week of October 16 through 22, 2022, as "National Chemistry Week".

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

bill.summary:
This resolution designates the week beginning on October 16, 2022, as National Chemistry Week.
The resolution also recognizes the need to promote the fields of science, including chemistry, technology, engineering, and mathematics, and to encourage youth, including from underrepresented groups, to pursue careers in these fields.
